page.shortlink: UX Control Field Properties Validation Xbasic
page.description: Specify Xbasic code to test if the data in this field is valid. By default, only dirty fields are validated. You can specify that all fields should be validated in Update Settings, Edit Properties. If this field is a Repeating Section, see the setting in the Repeating Section for 'Validation - field option' and 'Validation - row option'.
